howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Download Instagram content in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Copy the Link
step1.description: Find the Instagram post, reel, or story you want to download and copy its URL.

step2.title: Paste & Analyze
step2.description: Paste the URL into InstaOrbit. Our system instantly analyzes the content.

step3.title: Download
step3.description: Click download and save the content to your device in HD quality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about InstaOrbit

q1.question: Is InstaOrbit free to use?
q1.answer: Yes! InstaOrbit is completely free. No hidden charges, no subscriptions, no premium plans. Download unlimited Instagram content at no cost.

q2.question: Do I need to create an account?
q2.answer: No account needed. Simply paste the Instagram URL and download. We don't store any of your personal data.

q3.question: What content can I download?
q3.answer: You can download Instagram Reels, Videos, Photos, Stories, IGTV, and carousel posts. All in original HD quality.

q4.question: Is it safe to use InstaOrbit?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use secure HTTPS connections, don't store any user data, and never ask for your Instagram login credentials.

q5.question: Why isn't my download working?
q5.answer: Make sure the Instagram post is public. Private account content cannot be downloaded. Also check that you're using the correct URL format.

q6.question: Can I download from private accounts?
q6.answer: No, InstaOrbit only works with public Instagram posts. We respect user privacy and content restrictions.

footer.disclaimer: InstaOrbit is not affiliated with Instagram or Meta. Please respect content creators' rights.
